title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte heaps praise on Cesc Fabregas
text:
Antonio Conte says Cesc Fabregas is an important player to him now (Picture: Getty) Chelsea manager Antonio Conte has lavished Cesc Fabregas with praise after his remarkable turnaround in form as the season has gone on.
Wenger embarrasses himself by comparing Arsenal flop to Kante The Spain international looked finished at Stamford Bridge after barely being used by Conte in the early part of the campaign, but has played a bigger role recently.
There was even speculation that Fabregas could be sold by Chelsea in January, with rumours of interest from AC Milan and from clubs in the Chinese Super League.
Fabregas has had to fight his way back into the Chelsea team (Picture: Getty) However, the former Arsenal captain stayed put and has impressed Conte tremendously with both his performances and his personality.
‘Cesc, this season, is showing to be a great professional but, above all, a great player. I’m very pleased to see that in him, his commitment and work-rate,’ Conte said.

‘This season he faced a new situation. Cesc, in the past, has always played every single game. It’s not easy to change.
‘But, for sure, Cesc showed me that he is not only a great player but a great person.
‘I think, this season, he has improved a lot in all aspects and, for me, he is a really, really important player.’
